text: Iowa is the second studio album by American heavy metal band Slipknot. It was released on August 28, 2001. The producers were Ross Robinson and the band itself. The album's title came from the band's home state Iowa. Singles include "Left Behind" and "My Plague". The Album is considered Nu Metal with elements of Death Metal and Alternative Metal. == Singles from Iowa == *2001 - "Left Behind" *2002 - "My Plague" Category:2001 albums Category:Nu metal albums Category:Slipknot albums Category:Roadrunner Records albums
title: Iowa (Slipknot album)
